name: Rube Goldberg Machine Assignment (Nymh)
description:
Week 2 Assignment- Rube Goldberg Machine

Going into this project was worrying for me as my computer was struggling with the program, so I hadn't gotten around to formulating a plan. During class we were told we could make ramps so when I got the program up and working again thats what I did first. The ramp reminded me of a playground slide, so I decided to make it bright yellow and as one of my favorite facets of art making  is playing with color palettes, I thought it would be fun to make a pastelized scene.

After I had my color palette figured out I continued with the playground theme and made the blue seesaw and from there I let physics guide where I should place an object for chain reactions to occur.

Overall I was really excited with how this project turned out.
